channel.title: Connect to an internal web application using AWS Verified Access on AWS System Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Connect to an internal web application using AWS Verified Access on AWS System Manager

item.title: Run Project
item.description: Run Project After the Verified Access endpoint is created and switched to active state. The next step is to create a new record: a C-name record (CNAME) with the subdomain name “HR” to match the application domain. We go back to Route53 > Hosted zones in use > Create record Record name(Record name): hr. Record type(Record type): CNAME â€“ Routes traffic to another domain name and to some AWS resources.
